summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Human Resources; authorizing an application to and agreement with the Medina Foundation for financial assistance to the City for the conduct of a Mount Baker Youth Services Bureau Volunteer Resources Coordination Program, establishing one additional position of Social Work Volunteer Coordinator (part time) and increasing certain objects of expenditure in the 1976 Budget of said Department, making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
